Reviews.Title: “Dissappointing - even for a cheap hotel”
Reviews.Author: LyricalMiracle
Reviews.Content: ive stayed plenty cheap hotels italy mainly rome florence worst ive stayed shared squeezed beds bareable hot weather air conditioning wasnt nights horribly hot sweaty window breeze nights cool time church bells morning 5am literally 10 metres window annoying bath couldnt shower cos shower curtain found plug didnt bath dirty water day half thats fix breakfast pretty average walk centre rome yes train station rome visit rome leave

Reviews.Title: “hostile staff”
Reviews.Author: frederica85
Reviews.Content: yo lazio 60th 84 mother 4 lift lift stoped short roomsthere bathrooms plug socket wall shower curtain water everywere fire alarm 5 times day rude staff moved reach lift hostile staff stay

Reviews.Title: “Great for a school trip!”
Reviews.Author: beautifullytanbabe
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend school trip girl hotel isnt bad caution hotel school kids trips time nights sleep hotel close bus shopping centre termini getting cafe entrance meals clean larger light fittings dodgy check bed slats leave deposit bed bugs thin sheets cold easily pack blanket bathrooms clean showers hot powerful cant complain breakfast uninspiring fruit youghurt cereal id nutella ham cheese breadrolls consider taking cereal bars buying bread supermarket instead dont life milk suggest buy own hotel sleep perfect school trips

HotelInfo.Name: Lazio
HotelInfo.Address: Via Vicenza 8, 00185 Rome, Italy
